job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: Knock is on a mission to empower people to move freely The Knock Home Swap makes it easy for consumers to buy their new home before selling their old one skipping the hassles of living through repairs and showings paying only one mortgage at a time and having home prep covered upfront so their old house sells for the highest possible price Knock currently offers the Home Swap in 34 markets in nine states and countingbrbrLaunched in 2015 by founding team members of Truliacom  Knock has raised more than 600 million in debt and equity from top tier investors including RRE Ventures Foundry Group Redpoint Greycroft Corazon Capital Correlation Ventures Great Oaks Venture Capital and FJ LabsbrbrstrongEnjoying Life amp Making an Impactbrbrstrongul li Knock is a 100 remote work from home culture and has been since our inception in 2015 li li 100 employee covered medical dental amp vision premiums li li Unlimited PTO 2 week min is highly encouraged  flexible work schedules li li 1000 each year for professional development li li Salary  Equity We offer equitable compensation based on market data your experience amp geographic location li li Paid parental leave li li We believe in creating diverse equitable and inclusive practices and programs that will further Knocks commitment to making an impact learning putting people first being open and courageous li brbrulstrongMachine Learning EngineerbrbrstrongstrongWed love you to bringbrbrstrongul liCurrently enrolled in or have completed a Masters or PhD program in a relevant fieldli liCandidates about to complete a Bachelors degree will be considered with demonstrated ML experienceli liProgramming experience in Python and TensorflowPyTorchExperience building ML solutions and experimenting to improve ML system performanceli liA desire to build cool cutting edge ML techli liStrong understanding of probability and machine learningli liSelfmotivation and ability to work independently as well as with a remote teamli liBelief in creating diverse equitable and inclusive practices and programs that will further Knocks commitment to making an impact learning putting people first being open and courageousli liWe encourage you to apply even if you dont have every listed requirement li liKnock is a 100 remote work from home culture and has been since our inception in 2015li brbrulAs a strongMachine Learning Engineerstrong your journey will look like thisbrbrWeek 1 you will begin learning about our machine learning modelsbrbrWeek 2 you will have a reasonably scoped machine learning project to dive into enabling you to demonstrate your skills and have an impact immediatelybrbrDuring your journey youll have an opportunity to engage with not only other machine learning engineers and data scientists but also members of the engineering and product teams In the process youll gain a better understanding of how our pricing models impact Knocks operations and ultimately the customer You will have access to all our data and AWS computing resources to query explore and train models using the data using any programming language and packages you feel you prefer But most importantly youll have the time and space to experiment read academic literature develop new skills and learn about existing methodologies that may contribute to advancing Knocks machine learning technologybrbrWe are proud to be a distributed company from our founding with employees in 28 states and counting This is an amazing opportunity to be an integral part of building a multibillion dollar consumer brand in an industry that is long overdue for a new way of doing things You will be working with a passionate team that is disrupting the status quobrbrKnock and its subsidiaries are committed to creating a diverse inclusive and equitable environment and are proud to be an equal opportunity employer All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race color religion gender gender identity or expression sexual orientation national origin genetics disability age or veteran statusbrbrstrongPlease no recruitment firm or agency inquiries you will not receive a reply from usbrbrstrongstrongThis position is in the continental United StatesbrbrstrongstrongPDF is our preferred format for resumes and any other attachments Thank youbrbrstrong
